name: Garlicle
description: The Garlicle is a small, chaotic neutral plant creature with a unique appearance resembling a bulbous plant with cloves. It often employs clever tactics in battles to impair foes and support allies.
memorable: Its unpredictable abilities cause varying fortune outcomes in combat, making each encounter chaotic and engaging.
goals: To create mayhem in battle while assisting allies and avoiding detection.
relations: Related to other plant creatures and tricky fey beings.
environment: Typically found in natural areas with abundant plant life.
strengths: High passive perception and excellent stealth due to Plant Camouflage.
weaknesses: Very low physical strength and limited melee effectiveness without spell support.
attacks: Uses a basic melee attack with a Walking Staff and can create unpredictable effects with Cloves of Fate based on dice rolls.
most_powerful_ability: The Cloves of Fate ability allows for a range of chaotic outcomes affecting allies and enemies alike.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet and a passive Perception score of 16, making it highly aware.
skills: Excels in Insight and Perception with a +6 bonus, reflecting its strong ability to notice details and discern intentions.
additional_information: Powered by innate spellcasting with Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.
Can cast utility spells like guidance and shillelagh at will.
Possesses the Tearful Stench ability that can blind nearby foes when damaged.
Uses advantage on Stealth checks in obscuring plant life.
Has a very ineffective melee attack unless using spells to enhance it.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting allows it to cast spells like shillelagh and entangle without material components.
test_queries: chaotic plant creature with trickster abilities
plant monster that affects luck in battle
small trickster plant that uses spells
